run_label: str: A folder will be created with this name in your output directory
emulator_output_folder_path: str: A folder that stores csv files containig the emulator predictions. Predictions should be labeled as predictions_YYYY_MM_DD_HH_mm_SS.csv
satellite_file_path: str: A csv file that contains the satellite data for comparison.
obsSdCensor: float: The highest standard deviation acceptable for satellite measurements (those higher will be filtered out).
emulator_inputs_file_path: str: A csv file that includes the feature values for each emulator variant.

subregion_filter.toggle_filter: boolean: Indicates whether or not to perform the workflow on a spatial subregion of the given data

parameters_dictionary.notes: This is just an example to expand to the full names of parameters when making plots.
